page.title: 10COMMUNITY CENTRE NAIRN
page.content: {FRIDAY NIGHT YOUTH CLUB Friday{6.30}is the opening time of the youth club,where children aged{5to12} spend{two and a half hours}playing games,dancing and participating in various activities.There is an art competition with a different theme every week.The disco goes on all evening.There is a{tuck shop}upstairs} where the{T.V.}is situated and a table tennis table,most nights the noise distracts the people watching the{T.V. The dart and pool room is the quietest room where a lot of concentration goes on.It costs{20p}to have agame of pool. The {big hall}is where most activities such as{football,basketball,badminton and{rollerskating.}To our great dissapointment it closes at{9.30pm.}In our school{65}children regularly attend.The most popular activity is the disco with football running second
